timewalker:Unfreezable.

Deal 9 (12) damage to ALL enemies.
Deal 1 less damage for each enemy at the left of the target.

cards.description: Play the bottom card of your draw pile. If it's going to discard pile, timewalker:Freeze it.

For each timewalker:Time in your hand, draw a card.

cards.description:
Deal 15 (20) damage.
Gain [E].
Randomize effect above and timewalker:Time of this card.

cards.description: Whenever you play a timewalker:Past card, gain 3 (4) Block.

cards.description:
timewalker:Summon X (+1) timewalker:Doppels.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Butterfly Effect
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Deals 4 (6) additional damage for each card you played this turn whose timewalker:Time is different from this card.

cards.name: Charged Blow
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
timewalker:Static: When you play another card, increase this card's damage by 1 (2) this combat.

cards.name: Contract
cards.description: The first Status you draw each turn costs 0 this turn.

timewalker:Unfreezable.

cards.description:
timewalker:Freeze a card.
Gain [E] equal to its cost.
If it's a Status, Exhaust it.

cards.description:
Apply timewalker:Slow.
Exhaust. 
(Max amount of timewalker:Slow from this card is 10)

Deal 7 (10) damage.

timewalker:Summon a timewalker:Doppel with a card in your discard pile.

timewalker:Static: You have 2 (3) additional Dexterity.

Choose 1 of 3 cards from last game to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

timewalker:Freeze any number of cards.

timewalker:Freeze.

timewalker:Freeze 2 cards.
Gain [E] ( [E]).

timewalker:Freeze your hand.
Draw 1 card for each timewalker:Frozen card.
Exhaust (timewalker:Freeze).

cards.name: Turbulence

cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Randomize timewalker:Time of ALL cards in your hand.

cards.name: Unfreeze
cards.description:
Gain 4 (7) Block.
Put 1 timewalker:Frozen card into your hand at random.

cards.name: Vortex
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
If you haven't played this card this turn, timewalker:Summon a timewalker:Doppel with this card.

cards.name: Worm Hole
cards.description:
Gain a timewalker:Doppel slot.
Increase damage and Block value of timewalker:Doppels by 1 (2).

cards.name: Accelerate
cards.description: This turn, your timewalker:Past cards take effect immediately instead of the start of next turn.

cards.name: Dimensional Evade
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Gain 1 Artifact.
End your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Diplopia
cards.description:
Choose a card. Next turn, add X (+1) copies of that card into your hand.
Exhaust.

timewalker:Summon a (2) timewalker:Doppel (Doppels) with a (2) card (cards) in your draw pile.
Exhaust.

Exhaust ALL Status. Deal 7 (10) damage for each Exhausted card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fold

Deal 12 (16) damage.
After you play 12 cards, enemy can't deal damage from Attack for one turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: High-Dimension Form

Whenever you play a card whose cost is not 0, draw 1 card.
~~- Ethereal. -~~

cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
Deals 2 more damage for each Promise added but not played this combat.

cards.name: Phantom Barrier
cards.description:
Retain.
Increase the following value by 1.
timewalker:Static: Prevent the next 1 (2) time (times) you would lose HP. Then Exhaust this card.

cards.name: Phantom Mace
cards.description: Deal 27 (36) damage.

cards.name: Phantomize
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) timewalker:Flash.
You won't lose timewalker:Flash.

cards.name: Quantum Mirror
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal.  -~~ Exhaust.
timewalker:Static: The next 2 card you play are played one more time.
(Reset when leaving hand)

cards.name: Solidify
cards.description:
Increase values after timewalker:Static by 1.
timewalker:Static cards are Retained.

cards.name: Supergravity
cards.description: Increase values on timewalker:Past cards by 33 %.

cards.name: Time Entropy
cards.description:
Can only be played if this is the last card you played in every 12 cards.
Deal 30 (40) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Time Leap
cards.description:
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Choose a timewalker:Time and change ALL hands to it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Yesterday Once More
cards.description: At the end of your turn, put the 2 cards that are most recently in discard pile into your hand and Retain them.

relics.name: Cell Phone
relics.description: At the start of each combat, timewalker:Summon a timewalker:Doppel with a Strike from your draw pile.

relics.name: Antenna
relics.description: Increase damage and Block value of timewalker:Doppels by 1.
relics.flavorText: It empowers you to contact with other worlds.

relics.name: Accelerator
relics.description: The first timewalker:Past card you play each turn takes effect immediately instead of the start of next turn.
relics.flavorText: It seems to be from a certain scientific device.

relics.name: Stopwatch
relics.description: Draw 1 card for 4 0-cost cards you play.

relics.name: Book of Omniscience
relics.description: Whenever you play a timewalker:Past, timewalker:Present, and timewalker:Future card in the same turn, gain 1 timewalker:Flash.
relics.flavorText: I borrowed it from other worlds.

relics.name: Tempus Helmet
relics.description: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Block for each timewalker:Frozen card.
relics.flavorText: It prevents shockwave from temporal operations.

relics.name: Lie Detector
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your Promises are replaced with Lies.
relics.flavorText: Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.

relics.name: Smart Phone
relics.description: Replaces Cell Phone. Starts combat with an additional timewalker:Doppel slot, draw 3 additional cards, and timewalker:Summon 3 timewalker:Doppels.
relics.flavorText: Technology changes the life of multiple worlds.

relics.name: Unstable Activator
relics.description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards. Whenever you draw a card, randomize its timewalker:Time.

relics.name: Time Cage
relics.description: You may prevent any number of timewalker:Frozen cards returning to draw pile.
relics.flavorText: In the cage, you can't feel time flowing.

potions.name: Time Potion
potions.description: Change Time of up to 2 cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Timewalker:doppel
keywords.description:
When Summoned, choose a card to remove from combat. Passive effect of the Doppel is the weakened version of the card.
When Evoked, return the removed card to your hand and it costs 0 this turn.

keywords.name: Timewalker:flash
keywords.description: Reduce unblocked attack damage. If you take unblocked attack damage this turn, reduce amount of Flash by 1 next turn.

keywords.name: Timewalker:freeze
keywords.description: Remove from combat this turn. At the start of your turn, put it to the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Timewalker:future
keywords.description: The card costs 0, but adds Status to your discard pile.

keywords.name: Timewalker:past
keywords.description: The card is more powerful, but takes effect at the start of next turn.

keywords.name: Timewalker:slow
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, target receives 10% more damage from Attacks this turn.

keywords.name: Timewalker:static
keywords.description: Gain effect when this card enters your hand. Lose effect when this card leaves your hand.

keywords.name: Timewalker:summon
keywords.description: Summon a Doppel and put it into the first slot. If you have no empty slots, your first Doppel is automatically Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Timewalker:time
keywords.description:
Past: The card is more powerful, but takes effect at the start of next turn.
Present: Initial state of a card.
Future: The card costs 0, but adds Status to your discard pile.

keywords.name: Timewalker:unfreezable
keywords.description: When this card is Frozen, put this card into your hand and reduce its cost to 0 this turn.

mods.name: The Time Walker
mods.credits:
Korean localization: snumodder.
  BaseMod, ModTheSpire: Kiooeht and other contributors.
mods.description: Add new character time walker to Slay the Spire.
